oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George W. Bush, Ben Hooks and others
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bush, George W.; Hooks, Benjamin L.; Turner, Jesse H.; presidents; portraits; 2000s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Benjamin Hooks and President George W. Bush with NAACP board members Amos Brown, Don Cash, and Jessie Turner. Official White House photograph.
